level.heading: Countersignatures not required.
level.text: A policy of insurance issued to a risk retention group, or any member of that group, shall not be required to be countersigned as otherwise provided in the District of Columbia insurance law.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 10-46
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-46, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-4101.
